page.title: 12HEALTH SERVICE
page.content: The area is served by 2 of a practice of 5 doctors working from Stanhope Health Centre, together with a dist- rict nurse, midwife and health vis- itor. Surgeries are held twice each weekday at Stanhope and once each week day at St.John's Chapel. There is no chemist in the area so prescrip- tions are obtained from the surgery or may be left for collection from St. John's Chapel Post Office. Ante-natal, family planning and chiropody clinics are held at Stanhope and a twice weekly surgery for dressings and injections. A mobile Chiropody Van visits St. John's Chapel 2 days a month. There is an ambulance station at St.John's Chapel,the nearest General Hospital is at Bishop Auck- land and there is a geriatric hospital at Stanhope. An optician and a dentist visit Stanhope 2 days a week.
